lead_paragraph: MACTAS--Leah, passed away on January 24, 2016 after bravely living through a long period of distress, never complaining and maintaining her characteristic strength and her well-known and admired smile. Leah was a woman who lived her life always "making a difference." The centerpieces of Leah's life were her love for her husband Leonard, her much adored sons Mark, Edward, Jay, Bruce and Seth, their wives, her ten cherished grandchildren and her great- grandchild. She also had the good fortune to be part of a large and wonderful family, including brother and sisters- in-law, cherished niece and nephew, all dearly loved. She will be remembered and missed by all. Her legacy is her gift to her loved ones. Donations in her memory may be made to: Leah Mactas Fund for Children, Temple Emanuel of the Pascack Valley, 87 Overlook Drive, Woodcliff Lake, NJ 07677. Funeral Services are 1pm, Wednesday, January 27, 2016 at Robert Schoem's, W-150 Rte. 4 East, Paramus, NJ, followed by burial at the Sanctuary of Abraham and Sarah, Cedar Park Cemetery, 735 Forest Ave., Paramus, NJ. 1/3
